mapper.select: /* IBIMS604BMapper.selectIBIMS604B */ SELECT STDR_DT AS STDR_DT /* 기준일자 */ , CRNO AS CRNO /* 법인등록번호 */ , DEAL_NO AS DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , JDGM_DCD AS JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , MTR_DCD AS MTR_DCD /* 부수안건구분코드 */ , ENTP_NM AS ENTP_NM /* 업체명 */ , RPRST_P_HNGL_NM AS RPRST_P_HNGL_NM /* 대표자한글명 */ , GRD_DWN_CNT1 AS GRD_DWN_CNT1 /* 등급하락건수1 */ , GRD_DWN_CNT2 AS GRD_DWN_CNT2 /* 등급하락건수2 */ , ARRS_INFO_CNT AS ARRS_INFO_CNT /* 연체정보건수 */ , FNCL_INFO_CNT1 AS FNCL_INFO_CNT1 /* 재무정보건수1 */ , FNCL_INFO_CNT2 AS FNCL_INFO_CNT2 /* 재무정보건수2 */ , CLS_QTT_CNT AS CLS_QTT_CNT /* 휴폐업건수 */ , ALTN_INV_YN AS ALTN_INV_YN /* 대체투자여부 */ , FST_CNFR_DT AS FST_CNFR_DT /* 최초확인일자 */ , ANS_ACPT_DT AS ANS_ACPT_DT /* 답변접수일자 */ , IVTG_RSLT_CTNS AS IVTG_RSLT_CTNS /* 검토결과내용 */ , HND_DETL_DTM AS HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , HND_EMPNO AS HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , HND_TMNL_NO AS HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , HND_TR_ID AS HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래id */ , GUID AS GUID /* guid */ FROM IBIMS604B /* 일별신용사건현황 */ WHERE 1=1 AND DEAL_NO = #{dealNo} /* Deal번호 */ AND STDR_DT = #{stdrDt} /* 기준일자 */ AND JDGM_DCD = #{jdgmDcd} AND MTR_DCD = #{mtrDcd}

SELECT A.STDR_DT AS STDR_DT /* 기준일자 */ , A.ENTP_NM AS ENTP_NM /* 업체명 */ , A.RPRST_P_HNGL_NM AS RPRST_P_HNGL_NM /* 대표자한글명 */ , A.CRNO AS CRNO /* 법인등록번호 */ , ( CASE WHEN A.GRD_DWN_CNT1 = 0 THEN '' ELSE 'G-CRS등급 하락 ' END || /* 등급하락건수1 */ CASE WHEN A.GRD_DWN_CNT2 = 0 THEN '' ELSE '신평사등급 하락 ' END || /* 등급하락건수2 */ CASE WHEN A.ARRS_INFO_CNT = 0 THEN '' ELSE '연체정보 등록' END || /* 연체정보건수 */ CASE WHEN A.FNCL_INFO_CNT1 = 0 THEN '' ELSE '완전자본잠식' END || /* 재무정보건수1 */ CASE WHEN A.FNCL_INFO_CNT2 = 0 THEN '' ELSE '감사의견 한정' END || /* 재무정보건수2 */ CASE WHEN A.CLS_QTT_CNT = 0 THEN '' ELSE '휴폐업' END /* 휴폐업건수 */ ) AS CRDT_ACDNT_OCRNC_DTLS /* 신용사건발생일상세 */ , A.DEAL_NO AS DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , A.JDGM_DCD AS JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , A.MTR_DCD AS MTR_DCD /* 부수안건구분코드 */ , B.MTR_NM AS MTR_NM /* IBDEAL명 */ , B.INSPCT_DPRT_DCD AS INSPCT_DPRT_DCD /* 심사부서 */ , B.INSPCT_DPRT_DCD_NM AS INSPCT_DPRT_DCD_NM /* 심사부서명 */ , B.OWN_P_ENO AS OWN_P_ENO /* 담당심사역 */ , B.EMP_NM AS EMP_NM /* 담당심사역명 */ , A.FST_CNFR_DT AS FST_CNFR_DT /* 최초확인일자 */ -- 확인일(심사역) , A.ANS_ACPT_DT AS ANS_ACPT_DT /* 답변접수일자 */ -- 확인일(심사부서장) , A.IVTG_RSLT_CTNS AS IVTG_RSLT_CTNS /* 검토결과내용 */ FROM IBIMS604B A /* 일별신용사건현황*/ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , B.JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , B.MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , B.MTR_NM /* 안건명 */ , B.INSPCT_DPRT_DCD /* 심사부서 */ , D.INSPCT_DPRT_DCD_NM /* 심사부서명 */ , B.OWN_P_ENO /* 담당심사역 */ , C.EMP_NM /* 담당심사역명 */ FROM IBIMS103B B /* 딜심사기본 */ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT EMPNO , EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B C WHERE 1=1
AND C.EMPNO = #{empno} /*담당자사원번호*/
) C ON B.OWN_P_ENO = C.EMPNO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CD_VL_ID AS INSPCT_DPRT_DCD , CD_VL_NM AS INSPCT_DPRT_DCD_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE 1=1 AND CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I010' ) D ON B.INSPCT_DPRT_DCD = D.INSPCT_DPRT_DCD WHERE 1=1 AND B.LAST_YN = 'Y' AND B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD IN ('309', '308', '501')
AND (B.OWN_P_ENO = #{empno} OR #{empno} IS NULL) /*담당자사원번호*/
AND B.INSPCT_DPRT_DCD = #{inspctDprtDcd} /*심사부서구분코드*/
) B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD WHERE 1=1
AND ((A.ANS_ACPT_DT IS NULL) OR (A.FST_CNFR_DT IS NULL))
AND A.STDR_DT >= #{stdrDt} /* 기준일자 */
ORDER BY A.STDR_DT DESC , A.DEAL_NO DESC , A.JDGM_DCD DESC , A.MTR_DCD DESC
